data.title: What's the Real Deal with Olive Garden?
data.htmlContent: What's the deal with Olive Garden? ü§î Is it *actually* authentic Italian food? Well, not exactly, and that's what makes it legendary! üçù Olive Garden is the king of American-Italian comfort food. Think endless breadsticks, giant bowls of pasta, and that famous salad. It's the place you go for a family dinner, a date night, or when you just need a hug in the form of carbs. Founded in 1982, it's become an American icon for a reason: consistently delicious, super welcoming, and always a good time. So grab a seat, and let's get this bread (stick)!

data.title: Still Not Convinced? Watch This! üòâ
Olive Garden Hours üïí
data.htmlContent:
Regular Weekly Hours

  • Monday - Thursday: 11:00 AM - 10:00 PM
  • Friday - Saturday: 11:00 AM - 11:00 PM
  • Sunday: 11:00 AM - 10:00 PM

Please note that holiday hours may vary. We recommend calling your local Olive Garden to confirm hours before visiting.

data.title: Your Biggest Olive Garden Questions, Answered! üì¢

items.question: Does Olive Garden have a gluten-free menu?
items.answer: YES! üôå They have a whole menu dedicated to gluten-sensitive folks. You can get rotini pasta with marinara or meat sauce, and even a grilled chicken parmigiana. They take it seriously, so you can order with confidence!

items.question: What are the lunch hours at Olive Garden?
items.answer: The legendary lunch deals (like the unlimited soup, salad, and breadsticks combo) are available on weekdays (Monday-Friday) until 3 p.m. So, plan your 'long lunch' accordingly! üòâ

items.question: Is the lunch menu available on weekends?
items.answer: Unfortunately, the special 'Lunch-Sized Favorites' prices are a weekday-only thing. But don't worry, the full menu is available all day, every day!

items.question: Does Olive Garden have a secret menu?
items.answer: While there's no official 'secret menu,' the 'Create Your Own Pasta' option is basically a secret menu in disguise! You can mix and match to create your own masterpiece. Also, pro-tip: you can ask for a mix of sauces. Alfredo-Marinara swirl, anyone? ü§´

items.question: Are there any vegetarian or vegan options?
items.answer: Totally! The famous breadsticks are vegan (just ask for them without the butter brush), and the marinara sauce is your friend. You can create a vegan pasta dish, and the minestrone soup is also vegan. Vegetarians have even more options, like the Eggplant Parmigiana and Fettuccine Alfredo!

items.question: Does Olive Garden offer a senior discount?
items.answer: Olive Garden doesn't offer a standard, chain-wide senior discount. However, some individual locations might have special promotions, so it never hurts to ask your server!
